    • Method Detail

      • updateInDB

        void updateInDB(org.apache.commons.jexl2.JexlContext _jexlContext,
              UpdateLifecycle _step,
              Set<Profile> _profiles)
                throws InstallationException
        Runs the update for given eFaps configuration item.
        Parameters:
        _jexlContext - context used to evaluate JEXL expressions
        _step - current step of the update life cycle
        _profiles - the Profiles that will be executed
        Throws:
        InstallationException - from called update methods

      • getFileApplication

        String getFileApplication()
        Name of the file application for which this XML file is defined.
        Returns:
        String containing the name of the application

      • readXML

        void readXML(List<String> _tags,
           Map<String,String> _attributes,
           String _text)
             throws SAXException,
                    EFapsException
        Read event for given tags path with attributes and text.
        Parameters:
        _tags - tags path as list
        _attributes - map of attributes for current tag
        _text - content text of this tags path
        Throws:
        SAXException - on error
        EFapsException - on error

      • getURL

        URL getURL()
        Returns:
        the URL of the CI.
